level.heading: Tax on estates and trusts--"In discretion of grantor" defined.
level.text: As used in this subchapter, the term "in the discretion of the grantor" means in the discretion of the grantor either alone or in conjunction with any person not having a substantial adverse interest in the disposition of the part of the income in question.

level.heading: CREDIT(S)
level.text: (July 16, 1947, 61 Stat. 348, ch. 258, art. I, title IX, § 9; enacted, Apr. 9, 1997, D.C. Law 11-254, § 2, 44 DCR 1575.)
